altername_name: Uki Uki Tsuri Tengoku - Gyoshin Densetsu o Oe
name: Ukiuki Tsuri Tengoku: Uogami Densetsu wo Oe
overview: Uki Uki Tsuri Tengoku Nagami Densetsu Oe is the latest one in the Teichiku fishing games for Playstation. Those games features fishing in islands. As a difference with the other games in the series the game uses the classic first person perspective and a third person perspective for the fishing part. This time the game takes place in the island of Hatsune and features lighthouses, fishing boats and different fish species and fishing spots. A lot of fish to be catched and different boats to use. The game features a complete encyclopedia with a lot of different kind of fish species.
